metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: 9.   Prepare the Agreement and Add Fields
Multiple document support in AI Assistant

subsection_analysis.refined_text: • Simplified mode for multiple signers This mode provides simplified authoring with the capability of assigning fields to multiple signers. When you select a signer from the right pane and add fields in the form, the fields are assigned to the signer. That means those fields will be available to the signer for filling the information and signing the form.

Signature date (Read-Only; Supplied by the system) • Checkbox • Places fields anywhere you click on the document. • Allows resizing of fields by clicking the bottom right corner of the field (blue triangle) and dragging the field to size. 2. Advanced Authoring can be enabled by selecting the toggle in the upper right corner. Advanced authoring: • Allows access to all field types (highlighted in yellow) • Supports form field detection (highlighted in green) •

Multiple document support in AI Assistant GenAl Assistant allows users to process up to 10 documents simultaneously, including non- PDF formats (.doc, .docx, .rtf, .txt, .ppt, .pptx), each up to 600 pages and 100MB. Users can switch between documents, with responses consolidated from various sources and proper attributions. Persistent history support is also included to provide continuous access to previous interactions.

Common questions I have multiple profiles associated with my Adobe account. How do I select which profile to send a request from? If you have multiple profiles associated with your organization-provided Adobe account, you must first choose which profile to sign in with. Then, request a product from that profile. The request will be routed to the organization and administrators associated with that profile. What if I can’t find the option to request access to AI Assistant for Acrobat?

License deployment You can manage the deployment of Acrobat AI Assistant through the Adobe Admin Console. As an admin, you must add users to the Admin Console using one of the methods described in Adobe Admin Console users. You can choose to either select the users to assign or create product profiles and assign users to the profiles. For more information, see Packaging apps via the Admin Console. Once you assign AI Assistant for Acrobat, the users must restart Acrobat to see AI Assistant.
